about_the_game:
Everplant currently is in a very early work-in-progress state


Everplant is an open-world sandbox game that allows you to customize the entire world. There are no limitations to your creativity.
Explore an infinite large, procedurally generated world to gather the necessary resources to reach far away planets. Build your own house with your best friends - but be careful, monsters might attack you. Dig for valuable resources to arm yourself from dangers and become a professional farmer.

If you prefer a peaceful atmosphere, become friends with monsters, or at least try to - monsters can become very vicious sometimes. If you manage to make a friendship with one of these little creatures, this can become quiet helpful in the end.
If you consider yourself a collector, you prove yourself by completing numerous albums.



The Everplant game developement journey has just started! Feel free to join me, Jesper, and support this project by adding Everplant to your wishlist :)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 50 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.5
  • Memory: 50 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
